fileSamples.statement: (A : Type) (B : Type) (f : res A) (g : A -> res B) (y : B) : bind f g = OK y -> exists x : A, f = OK x /\ g x = OK y.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct f; simpl; intros.
exists a; auto.
discriminate.

fileSamples.statement: (A : Type) (B : Type) (a : A) (g : A -> res B) (y : B) (H : g a = OK y) : exists x : A, OK a = OK x /\ g x = OK y.
(A : Type) (B : Type) (e : errmsg) (g : A -> res B) (y : B) (H : Error e = OK y) : exists x : A, Error e = OK x /\ g x = OK y.
(A : Type) (B : Type) (C : Type) (f : res (A * B)) (g : A -> B -> res C) (z : C) : bind2 f g = OK z -> exists (x : A) (y : B), f = OK (x, y) /\ g x y = OK z.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct f; simpl.
destruct p; simpl; intros.
exists a; exists b; auto.
intros; discriminate.

fileSamples.statement:
(A : Type) (B : Type) (C : Type) (p : A * B) (g : A -> B -> res C) (z : C) : (let (x, y) := p in g x y) = OK z ->
exists (x : A) (y : B), OK p = OK (x, y) /\ g x y = OK z.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct p; simpl; intros.
exists a; exists b; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (A : Type) (B : Type) (C : Type) (a : A) (b : B) (g : A -> B -> res C) (z : C) (H : g a b = OK z) : exists (x : A) (y : B), OK (a, b) = OK (x, y) /\ g x y = OK z.
(A : Type) (B : Type) (C : Type) (e : errmsg) (g : A -> B -> res C) (z : C) : Error e = OK z -> exists (x : A) (y : B), Error e = OK (x, y) /\ g x y = OK z.
(l' : list B) (H : OK nil = OK l') : list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) nil l'.
(l' : list B) : list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) nil nil.

(a : A) (l : list A) (IHl : forall l'0 : list B,
mmap l = OK l'0 -> list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) l l'0) (l' : list B) (H : (do hd' <- f a; do tl' <- mmap l; OK (hd' :: tl')) = OK l') : list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) (a :: l) l'.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct (bind_inversion _ _ H) as [hd' [P Q]].
destruct (bind_inversion _ _ Q) as [tl' [R S]].
inversion_clear S.
constructor.
auto.
auto.

fileSamples.statement:
(a : A) (l : list A) (IHl : forall l'0 : list B,
mmap l = OK l'0 -> list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) l l'0) (l' : list B) (H : (do hd'0 <- f a; do tl' <- mmap l; OK (hd'0 :: tl')) = OK l') (hd' : B) (P : f a = OK hd') (Q : (do tl' <- mmap l; OK (hd' :: tl')) = OK l') : list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) (a :: l) l'.
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct (bind_inversion _ _ Q) as [tl' [R S]].
inversion_clear S.
constructor.
auto.
auto.

fileSamples.statement:
(a : A) (l : list A) (IHl : forall l'0 : list B,
mmap l = OK l'0 -> list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) l l'0) (l' : list B) (H : (do hd'0 <- f a; do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd'0 :: tl'0)) = OK l') (hd' : B) (P : f a = OK hd') (Q : (do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd' :: tl'0)) = OK l') (tl' : list B) (R : mmap l = OK tl') (S : OK (hd' :: tl') = OK l') : list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) (a :: l) l'.

(a : A) (l : list A) (IHl : forall l'0 : list B,
mmap l = OK l'0 -> list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) l l'0) (l' : list B) (H : (do hd'0 <- f a; do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd'0 :: tl'0)) = OK l') (hd' : B) (P : f a = OK hd') (Q : (do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd' :: tl'0)) = OK l') (tl' : list B) (R : mmap l = OK tl') : list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) (a :: l) (hd' :: tl').

(a : A) (l : list A) (IHl : forall l'0 : list B,
mmap l = OK l'0 -> list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) l l'0) (l' : list B) (H : (do hd'0 <- f a; do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd'0 :: tl'0)) = OK l') (hd' : B) (P : f a = OK hd') (Q : (do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd' :: tl'0)) = OK l') (tl' : list B) (R : mmap l = OK tl') : f a = OK hd'.

(a : A) (l : list A) (IHl : forall l'0 : list B,
mmap l = OK l'0 -> list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) l l'0) (l' : list B) (H : (do hd'0 <- f a; do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd'0 :: tl'0)) = OK l') (hd' : B) (P : f a = OK hd') (Q : (do tl'0 <- mmap l; OK (hd' :: tl'0)) = OK l') (tl' : list B) (R : mmap l = OK tl') : list_forall2 (fun (x : A) (y : B) => f x = OK y) l tl'.
